title: Fernando Torres visited in hospital by Deportivo defender Alex Bergantinos after sickening clash of heads
text:
Fernando Torres visited in hospital by Deportivo defender Alex Bergantinos after sickening clash of heads Torres is now in a stable and conscious condition after the clash of heads with Bergantinos Share Paramedics gather around Atletico Madrid's Fernando Torres (Photo: REUTERS)     
Deportivo La Coruna defender Alex Bergantinos has visited Fernando Torres in hospital. 
The Atletico Madrid striker was knocked unconscious during the La Liga clash on Thursday night after a sickening clash of heads with Bergantinos. 
Atleti players immediately rushed over to check on the Spaniard, amid fears he may have swallowed his tongue. 
After receiving treatment on the pitch, Torres was stretchered off in a neck brace and taken to a nearby hospital. 
Atleti have since confirmed he is in a stable and conscious condition, but will remain in hospital overnight as a precaution. Atletico Madrid's Fernando Torres in action (Photo: REUTERS) Fernando Torres clash of heads Torres falls to the ground Teammates check on Torres 
Bergantinos made a late night trip to Modelo Hospital to check on Torres, along with Depor boss Pepe Mel. 
"On the field, I was praying he would recover consciousness as soon as possible," Bergantinos said. 
"It was head-to-head clash but he didn't expect it. Luckily the doctors were able to stabilise him. Teammates check on Torres (Photo: REUTERS) Torres is stretchered off (Photo: REUTERS) 
"You play on because you have to keep going, but you no longer think about the game. 
"These things happen in football. The important thing is that he is fine." 
Atletico later confirmed the striker was now in a stable condition and had already undergone scans on his skull and spine. Torres is put into an ambulance (Photo: AFP) Fernando Torres is put into ambulance (Photo: REUTERS) 
Boss Diego Simeone even admitted he heard the blow to the head from the touchline. 
"Worried, nervous, are the feelings after a blow as strong as he has received," he said. 
"I felt a noise from the bench, I do not know if it was the neck, but something felt, these are unfortunate situations that happen in the game." Like us on Facebook
